title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-12.2 - Variances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 56-12.2 - Variances

State Regulations

The failure by any person or entity performing work on or
in connection with an asbestos project, to comply with the terms and conditions
of any general or specific variance issued pursuant to article 2, section
30
of the Labor Law, from this Part, article 30 of the Labor Law, or any other applicable statutes, rules or regulations, shall constitute a violation of this section and shall
render the variance itself null and void in regard to such project. Non-refundable fees for variance processing shall be set forth in article 2, section
30
of the Labor

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
56-12.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
